import Mathlib

open Metric Set EuclideanGeometry Filter Topology

/--
Let $x : \mathbb{R} \to \mathbb{R}$ be a twice differentiable function satisfying $x(1) - x(0) = 1$, $x'(0) = x'(1) = 0$, and $|x'(t)| \le \frac{3}{2}$ for all $t \in (0, 1)$. Prove that there exists some $t \in [0, 1]$ such that $|x''(t)| \ge \frac{9}{2}$.
-/
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h1 := hv.1
  have h2 := hv.2
  have h3 := hs
  have h4 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
  have h5 : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4 0 (by norm_num)
  have h6 : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4 1 (by norm_num)
  have h7 : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4 0 (by norm_num)
  have h8 : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4 1 (by norm_num)
  have h9 : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h10 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by simpa using h
    have h11 : deriv x 1 - deriv x 0 = 0 := by linarith
    have h12 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4
    have h13 : x 1 - x 0 = 1 := hx
    have h14 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4
    -- Use the fact that the second derivative is bounded to derive a contradiction
    have h15 : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4 0 (by norm_num)
    have h16 : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h4 1 (by norm_num)
    -- Use the mean value theorem to derive a contradiction
    have h17 : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, deriv x 1 - deriv x 0 = (1 - 0) * (deriv (deriv x) t) := by
      apply exists_deriv_eq_slope x
      <;> aesop
    obtain ⟨t, ht, h18⟩ := h17
    have h19 : deriv x 1 - deriv x 0 = (1 - 0) * (deriv (deriv x) t) := h18
    have h20 : deriv x 1 - deriv x 0 = 0 := by linarith
    have h21 : (1 - 0) * (deriv (deriv x) t) = 0 := by linarith
    have h22 : deriv (deriv x) t = 0 := by linarith
    have h23 : |deriv (deriv x) t| < 9/2 := by simpa using h10 t ⟨by linarith [ht.1], by linarith [ht.2]⟩
    have h24 : |deriv (deriv x) t| = 0 := by simp_all
    have h25 : 0 < 9/2 := by norm_num
    linarith
  exact h9
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h1 : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
  have h2 : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
  have h3 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
  have h4 : x 1 - x 0 = 1 := hx
  have h5 : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h6 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      specialize h t ht
      simp_all [abs_lt]
      <;> linarith
    have h7 : ContinuousOn (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1) := hdiff.2.continuousOn
    have h8 : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) := hdiff.1
    have h9 : deriv x 1 = 0 := h2
    have h10 : deriv x 0 = 0 := h1
    have h11 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := by
      intro t ht
      specialize h3 t (by
        simp_all [Set.mem_Ioo]
        <;>
        (try constructor <;> linarith)
        <;>
        (try simp_all [Set.mem_Ioo])
        <;>
        nlinarith)
      simp_all [abs_le]
      <;> linarith
    have h12 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, deriv x t = 0 := by
      intro t ht
      have h13 : ContinuousOn (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1) := h7
      have h14 : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) := h8
      have h15 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := h11
      have h16 : deriv x t = 0 := by
        apply by_contradiction
        intro h17
        have h18 : deriv x t ≠ 0 := h17
        have h19 : |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := h15 t ht
        have h20 : |deriv x t| > 0 := by
          cases' abs_cases (deriv x t) with h21 h21 <;>
            nlinarith [h19]
        cases' abs_cases (deriv x t) with h22 h22 <;>
          nlinarith
      exact h16
    have h13 : deriv x = fun t => 0 := funext h12
    simp_all [Function.funext_iff]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> aesop
  exact h5
```

import Mathlib

open Metric Set EuclideanGeometry Filter Topology

/--
Let $x : \mathbb{R} \to \mathbb{R}$ be a twice differentiable function satisfying $x(1) - x(0) = 1$, $x'(0) = x'(1) = 0$, and $|x'(t)| \le \frac{3}{2}$ for all $t \in (0, 1)$. Prove that there exists some $t \in [0, 1]$ such that $|x''(t)| \ge \frac{9}{2}$.
-/

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h1 := hv.1
  have h2 := hv.2
  have h3 := hdiff.1
  have h4 := hdiff.2
  have h5 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
  have h6 : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h7 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      specialize h t ht
      simp_all
    have h8 : deriv x 1 - deriv x 0 = 0 := by
      simp_all [h1, h2]
    have h9 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := by
      intro t ht
      have h10 := h5 t
      simp_all [Set.mem_Ioo]
      <;> cases' abs_cases (deriv x t) with h11 h11 <;> linarith
    have h10 := h9 0 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
    have h11 := h9 1 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
    have h12 := h9 (1 / 2) (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
    have h13 := h9 (3 / 4) (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
    norm_num [abs_le] at h10 h11 h12 h13
    have h14 : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3 / 2 := by simpa using h9 1 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
    have h15 : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3 / 2 := by simpa using h9 0 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
    simp_all [abs_le, h1, h2, sub_nonneg, sub_nonpos]
    <;> norm_num at *
    <;> cases' abs_cases (deriv x (1 / 2)) with h16 h16 <;>
    cases' abs_cases (deriv x (3 / 4)) with h17 h17 <;>
    cases' abs_cases (deriv x 1) with h18 h18 <;>
    cases' abs_cases (deriv x 0) with h19 h19 <;>
    simp_all [abs_le, sub_nonneg, sub_nonpos] <;>
    norm_num at * <;>
    linarith
  exact h6
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h1 : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
  have h2 : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
  have h3 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
  have h4 : x 1 - x 0 = 1 := hx
  have h5 : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h6 : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by simpa using h
    have h7 : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
    have h8 : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
    have h9 : ContinuousOn (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1) := hdiff.2.continuousOn
    have h10 : deriv x = fun t => 0 := by
      ext t
      have h11 : t = 0 ∨ t = 1 ∨ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1 := by
        by_cases h12 : t = 0 <;> by_cases h13 : t = 1 <;> by_cases h14 : t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1 <;> simp_all [Set.mem_Ioo, Set.mem_Icc, Set.mem_Icc] <;>
        (try simp_all) <;>
        (try linarith) <;>
        (try exact ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩) <;>
        (try exact ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩) <;>
        (try exact ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩)
      rcases h11 with (rfl | rfl | h11) <;> simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt] <;>
      norm_num <;>
      linarith [h3 0 (by norm_num), h3 1 (by norm_num)]
    have h12 : x = fun t => 0 := by
      funext t
      have h13 : deriv x t = 0 := by
        simp_all
      have h14 : x t = 0 := by
        have h15 : x t - x 0 = ∫ u in (0)..t, deriv x u := by
          rw [← sub_eq_zero]
          simp_all [sub_eq_zero, mul_comm]
          <;>
          apply?
        simp_all [h10, mul_comm]
        <;>
        apply?
      simp_all
    simp_all
    <;>
    aesop
  exact h5
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h1 : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h2 := h 0
    have h3 := h 1
    have h4 := h (1 / 2)
    norm_num [abs_lt] at h2 h3 h4
    have h5 := hs 0
    have h6 := hs 1
    have h7 := hs (1 / 2)
    norm_num [abs_le] at h5 h6 h7
    norm_num [hv] at *
    <;>
    (try simp_all [Set.mem_Icc, Set.mem_Ioo, abs_le])
    <;>
    nlinarith [hdiff.1 (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) ∈ Set.Icc 0 1),
      hdiff.1 (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) ∈ Set.Icc 0 1),
      hdiff.2 (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) ∈ Set.Icc 0 1),
      hdiff.2 (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) ∈ Set.Icc 0 1)]
  
  simpa using h1
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h₁ : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
  have h₂ : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
  have h₃ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
  have h₄ : x 1 - x 0 = 1 := hx
  have h₅ : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h₆ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      have h₇ := h t ht
      simp_all
    have h₈ : ContinuousOn (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1) := hdiff.2.continuousOn
    have h₉ : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) := hdiff.1
    have h₁₀ : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
    have h₁₁ : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
    have h₁₂ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
    have h₁₃ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      have h₁₄ := h₆ t ht
      simp_all
    have h₁₅ : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h₁₂ 1 (by norm_num)
    have h₁₆ : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h₁₂ 0 (by norm_num)
    have h₁₇ : ContinuousOn (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1) := hdiff.2.continuousOn
    have h₁₈ : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
    have h₁₉ : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
    have h₂₀ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      have h₂₁ := h₁₃ t ht
      simp_all
    have h₂₂ : |x 1 - x 0| = 1 := by simp [h₄]
    have h₂₃ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
    have h₂₄ : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h₂₃ 0 (by norm_num)
    have h₂₅ : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3/2 := by simpa using h₂₃ 1 (by norm_num)
    have h₂₆ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      have h₂₇ := h₂₀ t ht
      simp_all
    have h₂₈ : |(deriv (deriv x)) 0| < 9/2 := by
      simpa using h₂₆ 0 (by norm_num)
    have h₂₉ : |(deriv (deriv x)) 1| < 9/2 := by
      simpa using h₂₆ 1 (by norm_num)
    have h₃₀ : |(deriv (deriv x)) 0| ≥ 9/2 := by
      have h₃₁ : deriv x 0 = 0 := hv.1
      have h₃₂ : deriv x 1 = 0 := hv.2
      have h₃₃ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := hs
      have h₃₄ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
        intro t ht
        have h₃₅ := h₂₆ t ht
        simp_all
      simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt]
      <;> norm_num at *
      <;> linarith
    linarith
  exact h₅
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_b4
(x : ℝ → ℝ)
(hdiff : DifferentiableOn ℝ x (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ DifferentiableOn ℝ (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1))
(hx : x 1 - x 0 = 1)
(hv : deriv x 0 = 0 ∧ deriv x 1 = 0)
(hs : ∀ t ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2)
: ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
  have h₁ := hdiff.1
  have h₂ := hdiff.2
  have h₃ := hv.1
  have h₄ := hv.2
  have h₅ := hs
  have h₆ := hx
  have h₇ : ∃ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| ≥ 9/2 := by
    by_contra! h
    have h₈ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |(deriv (deriv x)) t| < 9/2 := by
      intro t ht
      specialize h t ht
      simp_all
    have h₉ : ContinuousOn (deriv x) (Set.Icc 0 1) := h₂.continuousOn
    have h₁₀ : deriv x 1 - deriv x 0 = 0 := by
      simp_all
    have h₁₁ : ∀ t ∈ Set.Icc 0 1, |deriv x t| ≤ 3/2 := by
      intro t ht
      specialize h₅ t (by
        simp_all [Set.mem_Ioo, Set.mem_Icc]
        <;>
        exact ⟨by linarith [ht.1, ht.2], by linarith [ht.1, ht.2]⟩)
      simp_all
    have h₁₂ : |deriv x 1| ≤ 3/2 := by
      simpa using h₁₁ 1 (by norm_num)
    have h₁₃ : |deriv x 0| ≤ 3/2 := by
      simpa using h₁₁ 0 (by norm_num)
    simp_all [abs_le]
    <;>
    linarith
  exact h₇
```
